excerpt: Are you curious to know the release date and time for Blood of Zeus Season 3 Episodes 1-8? Then, here are the details.

text: The Blood of Zeus Season 3 Episodes 1-8 release date and time are right around the corner, and viewers want to know the streaming details. Blood of Zeus Season 3 is deemed the final installment. It will resume the story of Heron, Seraphim, and the Gods, prepared to face their greatest foes. They will battle against Typhon, Cronus, and the Titans. It would be a visual treat for viewers to witness an ultimate showdown between the mythological figures. Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episodes. When is the Blood of Zeus Season 3 Episodes 1-8 release date & time? The episodes’ release date is May 8, and its release time is 12:00 AM PT, 3:00 AM ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 8, 202503:00 AMPacific TimeMay 8, 202512:00 AM Where to watch Blood of Zeus Season 3 Episodes 1-8 You can watch Blood of Zeus Season 3 Episodes 1-8 via Netflix. Netflix is a global streaming giant that offers a wide variety of fan-favorite movies and shows such as Squid Game, Stranger Things, and much more. Unlike several other renowned streaming services, Netflix doesn’t offer viewers an option to try the service for free before opting for its subscription. So, a valid plan is needed to access its library. What is Blood of Zeus about? Blood of Zeus is an action series that follows the son of Zeus, determined to safeguard Earth and heaven. In doing so, he encounters numerous mythological entities and evil forces. The official synopsis for Blood of Zeus is as follows: “In a brewing war between the gods of Olympus and the titans, Heron, a commoner living on the outskirts of ancient Greece, becomes mankind’s best hope of surviving an evil demon army, when he discovers the secrets of his past.”
html:
The Blood of Zeus Season 3 Episodes 1-8 release date and time are right around the corner, and viewers want to know the streaming details.

Blood of Zeus Season 3 is deemed the final installment. It will resume the story of Heron, Seraphim, and the Gods, prepared to face their greatest foes. They will battle against Typhon, Cronus, and the Titans. It would be a visual treat for viewers to witness an ultimate showdown between the mythological figures.

Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episodes.

When is the Blood of Zeus Season 3 Episodes 1-8 release date & time?

The episodes’ release date is May 8, and its release time is 12:00 AM PT, 3:00 AM ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Where to watch Blood of Zeus Season 3 Episodes 1-8

You can watch Blood of Zeus Season 3 Episodes 1-8 via Netflix.

Netflix is a global streaming giant that offers a wide variety of fan-favorite movies and shows such as Squid Game, Stranger Things, and much more. Unlike several other renowned streaming services, Netflix doesn’t offer viewers an option to try the service for free before opting for its subscription. So, a valid plan is needed to access its library.

What is Blood of Zeus about?

Blood of Zeus is an action series that follows the son of Zeus, determined to safeguard Earth and heaven. In doing so, he encounters numerous mythological entities and evil forces.

The official synopsis for Blood of Zeus is as follows:

“In a brewing war between the gods of Olympus and the titans, Heron, a commoner living on the outskirts of ancient Greece, becomes mankind’s best hope of surviving an evil demon army, when he discovers the secrets of his past.”
